title: Did Trump Pose With a ‘Thumbs-Up’ Next to a Baby Orphaned in the El Paso Massacre?
subtitle: The infant’s parents died shielding the baby from the gunman’s bullets.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A photograph of U. S. President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump shows them with a baby who was orphaned by the August 2019 El Paso, Texas, mass shooting.
